additionalInformation: For strength heroes, One pair of Slippers of Agility grants 0.5 armor and 3 attack speed.
For agility heroes, One pair of Slippers of Agility grants 0.5 armor, 3 attack speed and 3 attack damage.
For intelligence heroes, One pair of Slippers of Agility grants 0.5 armor and 3 attack speed.
name: Slippers of Agility
description: Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.
